definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: devise, invent (bad sense) (Mish. id., Aram. [[בְּדָא]], bdo0 invent; cf. Ar. badao;a begin, make a beginning—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[בָּדָא]] 1Ki 12:33; Pt. sf. [[בּוֹדָאם]] (instead of [[בּוֹדְאָם]]) Ne 6:8—Jeroboam devised a feast in 8th month 1Ki 12:33; invent accusation Ne 6:8.
